comments.body: Every BECOME_METHOD except runas has a BECOME_ERROR_STRINGS and BECOME_MISSING_STRINGS.  Is it expected to exist for 'runas', too?
Yes, runas is different from most of the other become methods. If you are having an issue with it, please raise a GH issue with the details.

BECOME_MISSING_STRINGS    = {'sudo': 'sorry, a password is required to run sudo', 'su': '', 'pbrun': '', 'pfexec': '', 'doas': 'Authorization required', 'dzdo': '', 'ksu': 'No password given'} #FIXME: deal with i18n
